channel.title: Game Dev on Ingots of learning
channel.description: Recent content in Game Dev on Ingots of learning

item.title: Starting in Game Development
item.description: I’m a man of many ideas. Wanting to develop a simple game, then move onto more complex ones, is one of those ideas. Of course, many have done this before me and many will after me, so I have no qualms about standing on the shoulders of giants, and using a game engine that suits my needs. Now, onto that. In the game engine world, there are two contenders that everyone knows about (so far as I can tell).
